reviews.review: It is simply amazing

I've played just a little, but this is honestly a great port of the original. Autosaves are much more frequent, the new gun physics are neat, the visuals are much better than they were (which isn't saying much, but the water, for example, is on another level). I'm very new to Half-Life, so I'm not sure what people were expecting when this came out, but the game plays better than expected for someone who heard so much bad stuff about it. I almost didn't like it because a bug occurred early on in my session, but a load from the autosave fixed the issue (I wasn't being let in into the experiment room). I'm not going to finish the game because I JUST played the original and its two PC extensions, and then watched HL: Decay. But I got to as far as "We've Got Hostiles" and the game honestly has not disappointed me so far.

I just remembered that loads take longer than they should, and that guards and scientists grunt too much and in situations where they're not in danger. And I had another graphical glitch happen to me early on, so I'm knocking the score down from an 8 to a 7. Still not as bad as people say, from my admittedly short experience.
Score: 7/10

Half-Life: Source — переиздание игры Half-Life 1998 года на базе более eбaнутого игрового движка Source с рядом нововведений в исполнении багов и поломанной видеокарты. Переиздание было разработано компанией Vafle Corporation и выпущено в 2004 году посредством системы цифрового распространения Steam.После поломанного SteamPupok всем как-то поxyй поэтому всем как-то поxyй на это переиздание

Half Life: Source ist das perfekte Spiel, wenn man einen Klassiker nachholen und hassen lernen möchte. Neben zahlreichen Bugs (Wissenschaftler die über ihren Stühlen sitz-schweben, etc.) bietet es auch eine neue - äußerst fragwürdige - Physik; spitze! Auf der positiven Seite sind die, durchaus gelungenen, kosmetischen Verbesserungen. So wirken Wasser, Bluteffekte und Gordons Taschenlämpchen - und die davon resultierenden Schattenwürfe - wirklich hübsch. Aber Scheiße mit Schleifchen bleibt am Ende halt dennoch... genau... Scheiße.

Fazit: Wer einen wahren Shooter-Klassiker nachholen möchte, sollte lieber zum Origninal greifen oder hoffen das Valve irgendwann in einem Anfall von Nettigkeit noch einen kleinen Patch nachschiebt.

Keine Empfehlung und 3 von 10 Punkten von meiner Seite.

If you really wan't to play Half-Life, buy the original version and not this one. The good things that are in this version are 3D skybox on some maps, ragdoll physics(kinda), water reflections and shaders. It does have this things because its a port to the Source Engine. But after all this is just a bad version, it has a lot of bugs that didn't have in the original.

EDIT: After doing some research it looks like this game got f*cked by updates like the SteamPipe update. And also if you still want to play half-life source there is this mod call "Half-Life Source Fixed" which is much better and id say this is the way to play Half-Life Source.
https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-source-fixed
Not only this mod fixes bugs but adds quality life features. Like rezised maps so you dont get a loading screen every corner of the map and there's still the option to play the original maps, enable the half-life crowbar hits sounds so sounds hits will be diferent when hitting diferent surfaces just like in the original, half-life 1 style movement and sounds, half-life 1 mp5 recoil style, gibs, subtitles and some other misc options.

Also the good thing about this without the "Half Life Source Fixed" mod, you cant mount the game to others such as Garry's Mod to get all the textures and models.

One of the greatest and most influential FPS games of all time. When it first came out Half-Life revolutionized the FPS genre. And still to this day, you can feel it's effects on many FPS games. Before Half-Life there was DOOM, Wolfenstein. These games were just about running and gunning. Half-Life changed that formula. You can see that in the opening section in the game. Half-Life slowed down the gameplay and added more elements. In Half-Life, you have to be tactical. You can't rush into every enemy otherwise you'll be dead before you know it. You have to use every tool in your arsenal to get out of tricky situations. Half-Life was a huge deal back then and now years later playing it feels really good. The soundtrack is good, weapons sounds are great and gunplay is amazing. Level design is superb. There are platforming sections, stealth sections, creepy sections, we have lots of variety. The story is well written, characters are memorable. Mysterious G-Man, security guard Barney, protagonist Gordon Freeman, everyone has a charm to them. Enemy design is great. Headcrabs, houndeyes, every alien has a distinct feature and distinct behaviour. This game was ahead of its time, and it shows. It really is a masterpiece and better than most of the FPS games come out nowadays. If you are a FPS game fan and haven't played it, you definitely should play it. Half-Life is and always will be every FPS lover's favourite game.

NOTE: Source version of Half-Life is glitchy. It has some bugs and graphical issues. Before playing, download a mod that fixes these issues and enjoy the game.

Voici mon avis sur Half-Life: Source
Déjà, en gros, c'est Half-Life mais en beaucoup moins bien.

Point Positifs:
-Il y a de amélioration sur l'eau, mais sinon c'est rien
(-On peut exporter des choses sur Garry's Mod)

Points Négatifs:
-Les textures n'ont pas été bougés d'un point, ce qui est hallucinant pour un Remaster
-L'IA est devenu complètement stupide
-Les cadavres sont maintenant comme des objets, des "props", alors que Source est connu pour sa physique
-Les armes sont toujours les même, même pas améliorer
-Les personnages ne sont pas même modifier en HD ou autre
-Des Textures sont bugé
-Jeu de lumière infâme
-Des fois des maps sont juste cassés
-Dans les sauvegardes, le logo est le celle d'Half-Life 2 ! Quel fainéantise d'auprès Valve !
-Il y a toujours les mêmes bugs de la première version

Je trouve ça hallucinant d'auprès Valve de sortir ça, franchement quelle honte !
Heureusement qu'il existe un mod pour fixé ce jeu infâme 
https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-source-fixed

Heureusement que Valve n'a plus jamais fait ça
